title: Inline asm with `=m` constraint crashes rustc.
body:
rustc crashes when presented with inline assembly that uses a memory output operand.

Crashing code:

``` rust
#![feature(asm)]
fn main() {
    let _bug: u32;
    unsafe { asm!("nop" : "=m"(_bug)); }
}
```

I expected to see this happen: I expected this to compile successfully or output an error message.

Instead, this happened: rustc crashes

## Meta

`rustc --version --verbose`:
rustc 1.28.0-nightly (f28c7aef7 2018-06-19)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: f28c7aef7fbff1909c2d0257186cd7a5f0c6aa4b
commit-date: 2018-06-19
host: x86_64-apple-darwin
release: 1.28.0-nightly
LLVM version: 6.0

Backtrace:

```
$ lldb rustc
(lldb) target create "rustc"
Current executable set to 'rustc' (x86_64).
(lldb) run bug.rs
Process 12119 launched: '/Users/steve/.cargo/bin/rustc' (x86_64)
Process 12119 stopped
* thread #2, stop reason = exec
    frame #0: 0x000000010000519c dyld`_dyld_start
dyld`_dyld_start:
->  0x10000519c <+0>: popq   %rdi
    0x10000519d <+1>: pushq  $0x0
    0x10000519f <+3>: movq   %rsp, %rbp
    0x1000051a2 <+6>: andq   $-0x10, %rsp
Target 0: (rustc) stopped.
(lldb) c
Process 12119 resuming
Process 12119 stopped
* thread #3, stop reason = EXC_BAD_ACCESS (code=1, address=0x10)
    frame #0: 0x0000000105afcb9e librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`llvm::SelectionDAGBuilder::visitInlineAsm(llvm::ImmutableCallSite) + 4542
librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`llvm::SelectionDAGBuilder::visitInlineAsm:
->  0x105afcb9e <+4542>: movzbl 0x10(%r14), %eax
    0x105afcba3 <+4547>: cmpq   $0xe, %rax
    0x105afcba7 <+4551>: movq   %rdx, -0x18f0(%rbp)
    0x105afcbae <+4558>: ja     0x105afcc15               ; <+4661>
Target 0: (rustc) stopped.
(lldb) bt
* thread #3, stop reason = EXC_BAD_ACCESS (code=1, address=0x10)
  * frame #0: 0x0000000105afcb9e librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`llvm::SelectionDAGBuilder::visitInlineAsm(llvm::ImmutableCallSite) + 4542
    frame #1: 0x0000000105ae0f8a librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`llvm::SelectionDAGBuilder::visit(llvm::Instruction const&) + 106
    frame #2: 0x0000000105b6c340 librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`llvm::SelectionDAGISel::SelectBasicBlock(llvm::ilist_iterator<llvm::ilist_detail::node_options<llvm::Instruction, false, false, void>, false, true>, llvm::ilist_iterator<llvm::ilist_detail::node_options<llvm::Instruction, false, false, void>, false, true>, bool&) + 384
    frame #3: 0x0000000105b6b19f librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`llvm::SelectionDAGISel::SelectAllBasicBlocks(llvm::Function const&) + 8703
    frame #4: 0x0000000105b684fd librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`llvm::SelectionDAGISel::runOnMachineFunction(llvm::MachineFunction&) + 1789
    frame #5: 0x0000000104e00534 librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`(anonymous namespace)::X86DAGToDAGISel::runOnMachineFunction(llvm::MachineFunction&) + 20
    frame #6: 0x0000000105d670fa librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`llvm::MachineFunctionPass::runOnFunction(llvm::Function&) + 138
    frame #7: 0x00000001065bf9ce librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`llvm::FPPassManager::runOnFunction(llvm::Function&) + 510
    frame #8: 0x00000001065bfc53 librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`llvm::FPPassManager::runOnModule(llvm::Module&) + 67
    frame #9: 0x00000001065c010a librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`llvm::legacy::PassManagerImpl::run(llvm::Module&) + 954
    frame #10: 0x0000000104d5838c librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`LLVMRustWriteOutputFile + 396
    frame #11: 0x0000000104c4e5f6 librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`rustc_codegen_llvm::back::write::write_output_file::h37cdfc16325b0064 (.llvm.11000667573818349832) + 86
    frame #12: 0x0000000104c10b29 librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`rustc_codegen_llvm::back::write::codegen::_$u7b$$u7b$closure$u7d$$u7d$::h78d8e49a213e3e1b (.llvm.14968532932965549886) + 761
    frame #13: 0x0000000104c0db20 librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`rustc::util::common::time_ext::hb540f6223e60cdda + 80
    frame #14: 0x0000000104c506b7 librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`rustc_codegen_llvm::back::write::codegen::h160f97f9bd3f9f8f + 2407
    frame #15: 0x0000000104c57b40 librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`rustc_codegen_llvm::back::write::execute_work_item::h52ff3da292627dbf + 5616
    frame #16: 0x0000000104c1aab9 librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`std::sys_common::backtrace::__rust_begin_short_backtrace::hf1db14de5d68871f + 537
    frame #17: 0x0000000104c478be librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`std::panicking::try::do_call::hac2a3a34e94fa92b (.llvm.11000667573818349832) + 46
    frame #18: 0x00000001036a89bf libstd-17ddc69668032b7d.dylib`__rust_maybe_catch_panic + 31
    frame #19: 0x0000000104c24ae7 librustc_codegen_llvm-llvm.dylib`_$LT$F$u20$as$u20$alloc..boxed..FnBox$LT$A$GT$$GT$::call_box::he7294c5ca9567687 + 167
    frame #20: 0x000000010369b0f8 libstd-17ddc69668032b7d.dylib`std::sys_common::thread::start_thread::h47155863604fecdc + 136
    frame #21: 0x000000010366b799 libstd-17ddc69668032b7d.dylib`std::sys::unix::thread::Thread::new::thread_start::hceca2a4310512aa0 + 9
    frame #22: 0x00007fff56f65661 libsystem_pthread.dylib`_pthread_body + 340
    frame #23: 0x00007fff56f6550d libsystem_pthread.dylib`_pthread_start + 377
    frame #24: 0x00007fff56f64bf9 libsystem_pthread.dylib`thread_start + 13
```

The analogous C file
``` c
int main() {
	unsigned bug;
	asm volatile ("nop" : "=m"(bug));
}
```
compiles correctly with Clang 6.0:

```
$ clang-mp-6.0 --version
clang version 6.0.0 (tags/RELEASE_600/final)
Target: x86_64-apple-darwin17.5.0
Thread model: posix
InstalledDir: /opt/local/libexec/llvm-6.0/bin
$ clang-mp-6.0 bug.c
$ ./a.out
```
